passage:
Subject: Upcoming Team Building Event - Reminder!

Dear Team,

This is a friendly reminder about our team building event scheduled for next Friday, October 27th, from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM. We'll be heading to Adventure Land, a local outdoor park with various team-based activities designed to enhance communication and collaboration. 

The purpose of this event is to strengthen our team bonds and foster a more positive and productive work environment. Your participation is highly encouraged. Please RSVP by this Wednesday, October 25th, so we can finalize the arrangements with Adventure Land. You can RSVP by simply replying to this email.

Transportation will be provided. A bus will pick us up at the main entrance of the office building at 8:30 AM sharp. Please be punctual! Lunch will be provided at the park, but feel free to bring your own snacks and drinks.

In case of inclement weather, the event will be moved to the following Friday, November 3rd. We will notify you by Thursday, October 26th, if this change is necessary.

If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact Sarah Chen in HR.

See you there!

Best regards,

David Lee
Project Manager

questions.text: What is the main purpose of the team building event?
options: To provide employees with a relaxing day off.
To improve team communication and collaboration.
questions.correctAnswer: To improve team communication and collaboration.
questions.explanation: The email explicitly states that the purpose is "to strengthen our team bonds and foster a more positive and productive work environment," which directly relates to improving communication and collaboration. Bring their own transportation to the office.
questions.correctAnswer: Reply to the email before Wednesday, October 25th.
questions.explanation: The email instructs employees to RSVP by replying to the email by Wednesday, October 25th. (이메일은 직원들에게 10월 25일 수요일까지 이메일에 답장하여 회신해 달라고 지시합니다.)

questions.text: What will happen if the weather is bad on October 27th?

Employees will receive a refund for the event.
questions.correctAnswer: The event will be rescheduled to November 3rd.
questions.explanation: The email states that if the weather is bad, the event will be moved to November 3rd. (이메일에는 날씨가 좋지 않으면 행사가 11월 3일로 연기될 것이라고 명시되어 있습니다.)
